name: Pulse Europe Policy & Communications SPRL
goal: Provision of advice and consulting services on EU policy, in particular in the domains of automotive, transport, energy, environment and better regulation.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Transport
